name: Henry and Zak REMADE!
description:
The Remade version of The Henry and Zak Game.

Henry and Zak is a Sonic-inspired Platformer but with some twists. The Story is that Henry and Zak's worst enemy the evil cyborg has stolen the seven demon Gems and Henry and Zak are supposed to go and find them in a couple of stages with some obstacles. In some stages, there will be boss fights (Like 2 of them) 

Have fun!
